fieldUpdates.description: Used in marketing for a drip campaign
fieldUpdates.name: Certification for Consultants

fieldUpdates.description: If the instructor is ANZ, then the dietary requirements will update from the contact field
fieldUpdates.name: Dietary Requirements ANZ

fieldUpdates.description: This field will automatically set the created date as the registered date.
fieldUpdates.name: Registered Date = Created Date

fieldUpdates.description: When a participant attends a 3 day certification program and their status is updated to Certified, their contact record field certified will also be updated to Yes
fieldUpdates.name: Update Contact Certification
Update Email on Assoc. Training Contact

fieldUpdates.description: When a participant attends a TTT program and their status is updated to Attended, their contact record field TTTwill also be updated to Yes
fieldUpdates.name: Update TTT field

outboundMessages.description: This outbound messages sends information to Qualtrics for program feedback
outboundMessages.name: Qualtrics Outbound Message for Feedback

rules.fullName: Assoc%2E Training Contact Registered Date %3D Created Date
rules.booleanFilter: 1 OR 2
rules.description: This rule will automatically input the created date as the registered date.

rules.fullName: CAN - Notify %28Email%29 if ATC changes from one TE to a different TE - Exclude CAN SUSPENSE %28TE%29
rules.description: If a ATC (in a Prosci Canada event) changes what Training Event it is linked to (Eg. a participant changes venue) then send an email notification.
rules.formula: ISCHANGED( Training_Event__c ) && Training_Event__r.Training_Company__r.Name = "Prosci Canada" && Training_Event__r.Name <> "Suspense - Prosci Canada Certification"

rules.fullName: CAN - Notify %28Email%29 if ATC goes from PENDING to WAITLIST
rules.description: This was created for accounting purposes. Send an email when a Prosci Canada participants changed from PENDING to WAITLIST
rules.formula: ISCHANGED(Status__c) && ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'Waitlisted') && ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(Status__c),'Pending - Awaiting Approval') && ISPICKVAL(Training_Event__r.Instructor_Type__c,'Prosci Canada') || ISCHANGED(Status__c) && ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'Waitlisted') && ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(Status__c),'Pending - Awaiting Payment') && ISPICKVAL(Training_Event__r.Instructor_Type__c,'Prosci Canada')

rules.fullName: CAN - Notify %28Email%29 if ATC is CANCELLED
rules.description: This was created for accounting purposes. Event Title excludes "suspense," as that triggers emails when the contact is put into the suspense account. We want the rule to trigger when the contact is initially switched to CANCELLED.

rules.fullName: Certification Instructor %26 Training Manager %26 Venue
rules.description: When a participant is marked as certified, the Instructor and TM will be populated.

rules.fullName: Certification for Consultants
rules.description: When the program title equals Certification for Consultants and the status is attended, it will update the contact record. This is also used for Marketing workflow for a drip campaign

rules.fullName: Dietary Requirements ANZ
GetFeedback Email population on Assoc%2E Training Contact
GetFeedback Survey Email %28ANZ v%2E2%29 - All Program Non-Practitioner
rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND (5 OR 6) AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10 AND 11 AND 12
